page.title: 02Favourite Things, Evesham.
page.content: At{home}my{favourite thing}is playing with my dolls because it gives me fun and enjoyment. On{days out}I like going shopping at Cheltenham I buy clothes and have lunch at McDonalds. When we go on{holiday}I like going in the swimming pool. We go to a restaurant at night. My favourite{food is banana splits and knickerbocker - glories because they are filled with lots of nice things like ice-cream, cherries and jelly. At{school} I like P.E. On sports day we do all sorts of sports. I like running, it's good fun. My favourite{clothes}are jeans, summer dresses and my shorts. I like my summer dress because the design is like paints splashed on and mixed lightly. My favourite{T.V. programmes} are Dallas, The A-Team and Dungeons and Dragons.
